about.description:
Chalice is a microframework for writing serverless apps in python. It allows you to quickly create and deploy applications that use AWS Lambda. It provides:
  - A command line tool for creating, deploying, and managing your app
  - A decorator based API for integrating with Amazon API Gateway, Amazon S3, Amazon SNS, Amazon SQS, and other AWS services.
  - Automatic IAM policy generation
about.summary: Chalice is a microframework for writing serverless apps in python.

name: chalice
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "chalice" %}
{% set version = "1.11.0" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 63c744df00446aaefff254fbb238d0aa245d9fb349a03aee5e2b2c4899496465

build:
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"
  skip: True  # [py2k or win]
  
requirements:
  host:
    - python
    - pip
  run:
    - python
    - click >=6.6,<7.0
    - botocore >=1.12.86,<2.0.0
    - typing ==3.6.4  # [py<37]
    - six >=1.10.0,<2.0.0
    - pip >=9,<19.3
    - attrs >=17.4.0,<20.0.0
    - enum-compat >=0.0.2  # [py<34]
    - jmespath >=0.9.3,<1.0.0
    - wheel
    - setuptools
  run_constrained:
    - watchdog ==0.8.3

test:
  imports:
    - chalice
    - chalice.cli
    - chalice.cli.filewatch
    - chalice.deploy
  commands:
    - chalice --help

about:
  home: https://github.com/aws/chalice
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_family: Apache
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Chalice is a microframework for writing serverless apps in python.

  description: |
    Chalice is a microframework for writing serverless apps in python. It allows you to quickly create and deploy applications that use AWS Lambda. It provides:
      - A command line tool for creating, deploying, and managing your app
      - A decorator based API for integrating with Amazon API Gateway, Amazon S3, Amazon SNS, Amazon SQS, and other AWS services.
      - Automatic IAM policy generation
  doc_url: http://chalice.readthedocs.io/en/latest/
  dev_url: https://github.com/simplejson/simplejson

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - sodre
